name: EVENT PHOTOGRAPHY
description: I do event photography various events, capturing the atmosphere and personalities of each occasion. From conference photography for Marks and Spencer, product launches, seminars to restaurant Pop-Ups.

name: RESTAURANT PHOTOGRAPHY
description: I do restaurant photography with Restaurateurs, PR teams and Publishers. Capturing the atmospheres, cuisines, drinks, kitchens, interior & exterior settings as well as guests enjoying their experience. and portraits of proprietors, chefs and staff. I work in restaurant. name: CORPORATE PHOTOGRAPHY
description: I do corporate photography. For amongst others commissioned to take portraits of the people who make up these companies and visit workplaces to capture what makes working for these companies unique.
